mapper.insert: insert into lms_playlistCheck(studentID, playlistID, classID, totalVideo, totalWatched, regdate, updateWatched) values (#{studentID}, #{playlistID}, #{classID}, #{totalVideo}, #{totalWatched}, #{regdate}, #{updateWatched})
mapper.update: update lms_playlistCheck set totalWatched = (select count(*) from videocheck where studentID=#{studentID} AND playlistID=#{playlistID} AND watch=1)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM lms_playlistCheck order by id desc
